dc_title_s: Ellis Island showing boundary between states of New Jersey and New York
dc_description_s: Ellis Island today: Located in the Upper Bay west of Jersey City and southwest of Manhattan|This map of Ellis Island depicts the delineation of the jurisdictional boundary between New Jersey and New York, on Ellis Island, as per the Supreme Court ruling of 1998, New Jersey v. New York, 523 U.S. 767 (1998).|Map supplied by New Jersey Department of Environmental Protection, Bureau of Tidelands Management.|This map is a revised version (December 1, 1998) of the original dated April 30, 1997.
